summary: This bill, the Medicare Patient Access and Practice Stabilization Act of 2025, aims to amend Title XVIII of the Social Security Act to increase support for physicians and other practitioners adapting to Medicare payment changes. It proposes adjustments to payment calculations, including a 6.62% increase for certain services furnished between April 1, 2025, and January 1, 2026. The bill also makes conforming amendments related to this payment structure.
